translation.en: We're gonna do a vulnerability assessment
translation.ja: 連携エントリープログラムの

translation.en: for the coordinated entry program throughout the county.
translation.ja: 脆弱(ぜいじゃく)性評価を始めます

translation.en: I'm going to ask you some questions about your history of homelessness.
translation.ja: ホームレス生活について いくつか質問をします

translation.en: I'm also gonna ask you questions that'll help me understand
translation.ja: また物資の入手方法や

translation.en: how you get things that you need, what you do when you need help.
translation.ja: 支援が必要な場合の 行動も伺います

translation.en: Some of the questions may feel like I'm asking for personal information.
translation.ja: 個人的な質問に思えても

translation.en: I'm not trying to make you uncomfortable. We ask everyone the same questions.
translation.ja: 他意はありません 質問は毎回同じです

translation.en: The more information you give me,
translation.ja: 回答の情報が多いほど

translation.en: the better we are able to understand your situation and what your needs are.
translation.ja: 回答の情報が多いほど 実態を正確に把握できます

translation.en: All right. We'll just go ahead and get started then.
translation.ja: それでは始めます

translation.en: Sir, what kind of services do you need help with?
translation.ja: 何の支援が必要ですか？

translation.en: - I need a place. - Mm- hm.
translation.ja: 住む場所だ

translation.en: An apartment or a house.
translation.ja: アパートか戸建ての家

translation.en: Right now, I'm mostly looking for psychiatric care,
translation.ja: 一番求めてるのは 精神的なケア

translation.en: and I'm working on my housing.
translation.ja: 住宅も探してる

translation.en: That's about it, really.
translation.ja: それだけだ

translation.en: Once I get my housing, I have my base, and I'll be able to do what I need to do.
translation.ja: 家があれば生活基盤ができる

translation.en: How long have you been experiencing homelessness?
translation.ja: ホームレスの期間は？

translation.en: It's been about four years for homelessness.
translation.ja: 家を失って約４年になる

translation.en: Four years for being homeless.
translation.ja: ４年間はホームレスよ

translation.en: In November 2016, my brother put me up in the hostels for a couple of months,
translation.ja: 兄弟が2016年11月から数カ月 ホステルに泊めてくれた

translation.en: but I just didn't want to burden him with another bill.
translation.ja: それ以上は 負担をかけたくなかった

translation.en: I started staying out in the streets.
translation.ja: それから路上生活だ

translation.en: I've been here for two years. That's too long.
translation.ja: もう２年よ　長すぎる

translation.en: Do you have family, and did you have contact with?
translation.ja: ご家族と連絡は？

translation.en: There's no medical tent today?
translation.ja: 〝ラバメイ １回のシャワーを〞 医療用テントは？

translation.en: What do you need? A Band- Aid?
translation.ja: 〝ラバメイ １回のシャワーを〞 何が必要？

translation.en: Let me see if-- I got some stuff in the truck.
translation.ja: 車にあるかもしれない

translation.en: - What'd you do? Did you smash it? - No, it just got infected.
translation.ja: ぶつけたの？ 傷が化膿(かのう)してた

translation.en: And I went yesterday to the hospital,
translation.ja: 昨日 病院へ行ったら

translation.en: to general, and they numbed it and sliced it and drained it.
translation.ja: うみを吸引するために 切開された

translation.en: Oh, look. Ask Zia.
translation.ja: ジアに聞いてみて

translation.en: - Did she go with you? - She… She has a video.
translation.ja: 一緒に？ 動画がある

translation.en: That's cool you're kicking it with her. She's so cool.
translation.ja: 彼女がいてよかったね

translation.en: Yo, hey…
translation.ja: そうだ

translation.en: Last Tuesday I met her here.
translation.ja: 先週 ここで会った

translation.en: That's it?
translation.ja: それで？

translation.en: - Yeah, like-- - Oh, man…
translation.ja: まさか…

translation.en: I wanna get off the streets for her.
translation.ja: 彼女のために自立したい

translation.en: Oh, man. I know! Does she seem to have her head on straight?
translation.ja: やったね 彼女はちゃんとした人？

translation.en: - She's gonna take me and walk me through-- -
translation.ja: ジアは俺を導いてくれる

translation.en: Can we not do this at the showers, please?
translation.ja: ここではよして

translation.en: - Hey, Derek, what's going on, man? - Nothing's going on!
translation.ja: どうした？ 何でもねえよ

translation.en: - You're here. - I'm right here. I'm always here.
translation.ja: いたのか いつもここにいる

translation.en: - What's up with him? -
translation.ja: 彼が何か？

translation.en: Do you remember the landlord's name at the RV park in Arizona?
translation.ja: アリゾナにある車中泊施設の オーナーの名前 覚えてる？

translation.en: - Bonnie? - Yeah.
translation.ja: ボニー？

translation.en: - - Thank you. Shut up.
translation.ja: どうも 静かに

translation.en: You were working somewhere else when I first came, and I saw the girls.
translation.ja: 初めて会った時は 別の仕事をしてましたよね

translation.en: I got to working again, and things just kinda fell apart.
translation.ja: 働きだしたら 全てがダメになった

translation.en: 'Cause the second you report that you have enough money coming in to pay your rent
translation.ja: 家賃や生活費を 賄えるだけの収入があると

translation.en: and pay all your bills, bam!
translation.ja: 報告した途端よ

translation.en: There goes most of your food stamps. All of a sudden,
translation.ja: 急に食料支援が激減して

translation.en: the money that you had allotted to pay rent, now has to pay for food.
translation.ja: 家賃だった分を 食費に充てる必要が出た

translation.en: - Yep. - Because what is an immediate concern?
translation.ja: 目先の心配事はどっち？

translation.en: Your child eating that night, or the rent that's due in two weeks?
translation.ja: 子供の夕食と ２週間後の家賃なら

translation.en: I'm gonna feed my kid.
translation.ja: 私は夕食を選ぶ

translation.en: This is an extreme situation. We gotta get you guys into housing.
translation.ja: 極めて深刻ですね 住宅を用意しなくては

translation.en: You know, this is funny-- You don't--
translation.ja: おかしな話だけど

translation.en: You… You gradually get into an extreme situation,
translation.ja: 状況は緩やかに悪化する

translation.en: it doesn't seem as extreme.
translation.ja: 深刻に見えないの

translation.en: The public health and safety issues we've seen out there,
translation.ja: 衛生面と安全面で課題がある

translation.en: include the sanitation issues and risks of disease,
translation.ja: 公衆衛生上の問題や 病気の危険があり 〝シアトル 緊急事態対策センター〞 公衆衛生上の問題や 病気の危険があり

translation.en: and then also shootings, other violence, and crime
translation.ja: 銃撃や暴力 犯罪にも さらされている

translation.en: that are, obviously, a hazard to the people living in the camps,
translation.ja: 路上生活者や 周辺地域にとっては

translation.en: as well as the surrounding community.
translation.ja: 明らかに危険な状態よ

translation.en: And that's why we clean up locations.
translation.ja: よって各地の“浄化”を行う

translation.en: So, if we need more manpower because it's a larger site, um, we have that at our disposal.
translation.ja: より広い土地のために 人員が必要なら手配する

translation.en: So, this week, we visited 31 sites across the city.
translation.ja: 今週は市内の31カ所を 訪問した

translation.en: We made 50 contacts with individuals
translation.ja: 50人と連絡を取り

translation.en: and referred 19 people to shelters or alternative living arrangements.
translation.ja: 19人にシェルターや 代替の滞在先を紹介した

translation.en: I think the resources that you guys are using
translation.ja: そうした活動は路上生活者に

translation.en: are the right entry points, uh,
translation.ja: 正しい入り口を 提供していると言える

translation.en: to get these unsheltered individuals, uh, into the housing.
translation.ja: 保護されていない人々が 住宅を手に入れる第一歩だ

translation.en: But while we have developed a lot of units
translation.ja: 一方で多数設置した 自立支援つき住宅は

translation.en: of permanent supportive housing, um, we're not keeping pace to the need.
translation.ja: 一方で多数設置した 自立支援つき住宅は 供給が追いついていない

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.ja: どうも

translation.en: How did you end up homeless?
translation.ja: 家を失った経緯は？

translation.en: Well, that's a long story.
translation.ja: 話せば長い

translation.en: Well, it really started, to be honest, from 9/11.
translation.ja: きっかけは同時多発テロだ

translation.en: 9/11 put me in a deep depression.
translation.ja: うつ状態になった

translation.en: It was mainly because the cost of living is so high, especially in Hollywood,
translation.ja: ハリウッドは 生活費は高すぎて

translation.en: that I can't afford to live in an apartment.
translation.ja: アパートに住めない

translation.en: I lost my job, and the person I was staying with--
translation.ja: 失業し同居人も消えた

translation.en: I couldn't pay my rent. They had no understanding, so they kicked me out.
translation.ja: 家賃が払えず 家を追い出された

translation.en: Disability.
translation.ja: 障害のせいだ

translation.en: Jail, prison, um, substance abuse, mental health issues, family issues.
translation.ja: 囚人だったことや薬物乱用 精神疾患 家族問題

translation.en: Just a combination of things.
translation.ja: その組み合わせだ

translation.en: I came out as transgender my senior year in college,
translation.ja: 大学４年で トランスジェンダーと分かり

translation.en: and I kind of lost all of my family support.
translation.ja: 家族からの支えを失った

translation.en: I've been homeless since I was probably 19 or 20.
translation.ja: 19か20歳の頃から ホームレスになった

translation.en: I went to go stay with my daughter for a while.
translation.ja: 初めは娘の家に身を寄せてた

translation.en: And, after that, I winded down here, um…
translation.ja: その後は今のところで 世話になってる

translation.en: at the Union Rescue Mission. Yeah.
translation.ja: ユニオン･レスキュー･ ミッションよ

translation.en: Do you think you're getting enough to eat?
translation.ja: 食事は十分ですか？

translation.en: There's been a couple of times where I felt my stomach
translation.ja: おなかと背中が何度か くっつきそうだった

translation.en: was gonna touch my back.  'Cause I couldn't eat.
translation.ja: おなかと背中が何度か くっつきそうだった 食事ができず空腹でね

translation.en: I was hungry and didn't… didn't have no money, no food.
translation.ja: 食事ができず空腹でね お金も食料もなく

translation.en: I didn't know where to get no food from.
translation.ja: 調達する知識もなかった

translation.en: Was this the one that was on sale for $5?
translation.ja: 安売りで５ドルよね？

translation.en: - Four ninety- nine. - Hallelujah. Right on.
translation.ja: ４ドル99セント よかった

translation.en: Well, I'm gonna cook for my kids.
translation.ja: 子供に料理を作るの

translation.en: That's really cool.
translation.ja: いいね

translation.en: Total is twenty- six dollars and fifty- two cents.
translation.ja: 会計は26ドル52セントだ 会計は26ドル52セントだ 〝処理中〞

translation.en: Well, thank you. You have a good day.
translation.ja: 〝処理完了〞 ありがとう　いい１日を ありがとう　いい１日を

translation.en: Twelve ninety- nine, that's insane.
translation.ja: 12ドル99セントもした

translation.en: But I didn't think about it.
translation.ja: 考えてなかった

translation.en: Take that jacket off. I've got to wash it. It's filthy.
translation.ja: 上着も洗わなくちゃ 汚れてる

translation.en: Yeah. I gotta empty it out.
translation.ja: ポケットを空にする

translation.en: So, for tomorrow I gotta go to school.
translation.ja: 明日は学校で身分証をもらう

translation.en: - And get my ID. - I could finish laundry tomorrow.
translation.ja: 残りの洗濯は明日やるよ

translation.en: - Don't do laundry till Friday. - Okay.
translation.ja: 金曜までは洗濯しないで

translation.en: Saturday night, before we turn in, dinner or a movie?
translation.ja: 土曜は食事か映画でもどう？

translation.en: You tired?
translation.ja: 疲れた？

translation.en: - Exhausted. -
translation.ja: へとへとだ

translation.en: Hey, Mom.
translation.ja: 母さん

translation.en: I was just telling you that you're gonna be a grandma.
translation.ja: 実は子供ができたの

translation.en: No, I still have to go to the doctors and confirm and find everything out,
translation.ja: まだ病院で確認が必要だけど

translation.en: but it's a big positivo, probably.
translation.ja: まだ病院で確認が必要だけど たぶん妊娠してると思う

translation.en: I don't know, Mom. I'll-- I'll talk about this later.
translation.ja: どうかな　また後で話すよ

translation.en: - What'd they say? - Take care of yourself.
translation.ja: 何だって？ “体を大事に”

translation.en: Try getting into housing as fast as possible and be a family.
translation.ja: “早く家を見つけて 家族になれ”って

translation.en: All right, love you.
translation.ja: 愛してる

translation.en: - I'll see you.  - Bye.
translation.ja: それじゃ またね

translation.en: Call me. I love you.
translation.ja: 電話してね

translation.en: Kind of bougie.
translation.ja: 豪華ね

translation.en: ♪ In the darkness ♪
translation.ja: “第９章 神の覚え書き”

translation.en: Where do you usually sleep?
translation.ja: 普段眠る場所は？

translation.en: They have, uh, a dorm on the second floor,
translation.ja: 施設の２階に ドミトリーがあって

translation.en: um, and it's, like, 160 ladies. 'Cause it's bunk beds.
translation.ja: 女性が160人ほどいる 二段ベッドだからね

translation.en: How often do you say you sleep outside?
translation.ja: 野宿する頻度は？

translation.en: I did four nights, and that was two years ago.
translation.ja: ２年前に４日間野宿した

translation.en: Do you know where to go for showers and laundry?
translation.ja: シャワーや洗濯はどこで？

translation.en: I had to go to hotels to take showers
translation.ja: シャワーを浴びに ホテルへ行った

translation.en: when the maids left the room.
translation.ja: 清掃員が部屋を出た後に

translation.en: And, um…
translation.ja: それで…

translation.en: I kept going like that for a while.
translation.ja: しばらく続けてた

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.ja: 悪いね

translation.en: Do you ever feel scared or unsafe?
translation.ja: 危険な体験は？

translation.en: I've been molested, I've been stabbed, I've been shot,
translation.ja: 乱暴され 刺され 撃たれた

translation.en: I've been run over. Like, I've been through a lot of stuff.
translation.ja: いろいろと経験した

translation.en: How many times have you been attacked or beaten up since you've become homeless?
translation.ja: 路上生活で 攻撃を受けた回数は？

translation.en: Oh, recently I've been--
translation.ja: 最近だと…

translation.en: Like, four or five.
translation.ja: ４回か５回

translation.en: Okay.
translation.ja: なるほど

translation.en: How do you feel?
translation.ja: 感想は？

translation.en: It feels good to be off the streets. I'll tell you that.
translation.ja: 家があるのはいい

translation.en: You wake up, you roll over,
translation.ja: 寝返りをうったら

translation.en: you got your toilet right there and everything, huh?
translation.ja: トイレがあることとか？

translation.en: Good morning!
translation.ja: おはよう

translation.en: Make me understand, Luis. Being that you just got your place,
translation.ja: ねえ ルイス 家を手に入れたばかりなのに

translation.en: and in six months, you're gonna be homeless again?
translation.ja: 半年後には またホームレス？

translation.en: Yeah, 'cause the rent is 700.
translation.ja: 家賃は700ドルだ

translation.en: I was supposed to continue, but I can't afford that.
translation.ja: 住み続けようにも カネが足りない

translation.en: If not, the weather's nice enough out here that I could
translation.ja: もしそうなったら

translation.en: set up a tent and break it up in the morning.
translation.ja: ここでテント生活だ

translation.en: Nah. We're not gonna go backwards.
translation.ja: 逆戻りはしないよ

translation.en: - We came too far to go backwards. - Yeah.
translation.ja: ここまで来た そうだな

translation.en: It ain't by choice if I do.
translation.ja: 避けられればいいが

translation.en: What's up? You want water?
translation.ja: 元気か？

translation.en: Water?
translation.ja: 水だ

translation.en: - Thank you. - You got it.
translation.ja: 君にやるよ

translation.en: Patty, have you been in touch with Anna?
translation.ja: パティ アナと連絡は？

translation.en: Uh… I'm not sure. But I'm trying to go somewhere where I'm not--
translation.ja: いいえ 私はもうここには…

translation.en: It's okay. It's okay.
translation.ja: 大丈夫だ 大丈夫

translation.en: Was it-- What's his name? Mike?
translation.ja: 相手はマイク？

translation.en: Yeah. Okay.
translation.ja: 分かった

translation.en: It's been getting bad? Yeah.
translation.ja: 状況は悪化してる？

translation.en: All right.
translation.ja: そうか

translation.en: I got this scar from him.
translation.ja: この傷は彼が

translation.en: Okay.
translation.ja: ああ

translation.en: Was it recent? Okay.
translation.ja: 最近のこと？

translation.en: It was, like, a week or two ago.
translation.ja: ２週間くらい前

translation.en: - The last time when I seen her. - Last time he was here. Okay.
translation.ja: この人が来た時よ ひどい傷だった

translation.en: - It was big, she had a big-- - Okay.
translation.ja: ひどい傷だった

translation.en: Where's he at? Is he around?
translation.ja: マイクは近くに？

translation.en: - Yeah, somewhere. - It's okay.
translation.ja: ええ どこかに

translation.en: - And then today he hit me in the face. - Okay.
translation.ja: 今日は顔を殴られた

translation.en: - He's gonna end up killing me. - I know. You gotta get out.
translation.ja: いつか殺される 確かに避難が必要だ

translation.en: Hey, I'm out here at the basin.
translation.ja: 俺だ　盆地に来てる

translation.en: Yeah, Patty has been in a situation with Mike.
translation.ja: パティがマイクの件で 困ってる

translation.en: She got beat up again.
translation.ja: また殴られてた

translation.en: Is there any way that, while I'm out here, you can talk to somebody to see
translation.ja: 緊急避難施設(ブリッジ)の空きを 確認できるか？

translation.en: if we can get her into Bridge? She'll go today. She wants to get away.
translation.ja: 彼女は今日 避難したがってる

translation.en: What do you want to eat for dinner?
translation.ja: 夕食は何がいい？

translation.en: - Bacon, eggs, and grits. - Potatoes!
translation.ja: ベーコンと卵とグリッツ

translation.en: - Bacon, eggs, and grits. - That's breakfast food, though.
translation.ja: 私もそれがいい それは朝食よ

translation.en: Give me a hug. Okay. Bye, y'all. Have a good day at school.
translation.ja: ハグして ２人ともいってらっしゃい

translation.en: From the moment I met you, you didn't share anything.
translation.ja: あなたは何も話さず

translation.en: You were just trying to move forward.
translation.ja: ただ前に進もうとしてた

translation.en: I see you go to the grocery store every night, when we serve food here, to get food for your kids
translation.ja: ここで食事を提供してるのに 店で食料品を買い

translation.en: and come and make dinner for them every night.
translation.ja: 毎晩 夕食を作ってた

translation.en: Because I try not to lose our family in homelessness.
translation.ja: 家がなくても 家族を失わないようによ

translation.en: Like, despite the situation, Momma got you.
translation.ja: どんな時も子供の面倒は見る

translation.en: Right. So, let's talk about your story.
translation.ja: それでは あなたの話を聞かせて

translation.en: Okay.
translation.ja: いいわ

translation.en: Nine months ago, my ex started stalking me.
translation.ja: ９カ月前 元パートナーが ストーキングを

translation.en: He kicked my door in, and he pistol- whipped me, and he raped me.
translation.ja: 彼は家に押し入り 私を銃で殴り乱暴した

translation.en: Um, and I'm currently 32 weeks pregnant as a result of that.
translation.ja: それで今は妊娠32週目よ

translation.en: So, when I was in the hospital, I had black eyes, I was fucked- up- looking,
translation.ja: 入院中は目に青あざがあって ひどい姿だった

translation.en: and the Urban League here, they were able to get me in the hotel.
translation.ja: ＮＰＯがホテルを 手配してくれたの

translation.en: I didn't qualify for any supportive services.
translation.ja: 支援の申請はできなかった

translation.en: I couldn't sign up for housing. I was not considered homeless.
translation.ja: ホームレスとは 認められなかった

translation.en: - Because you were in a hotel. - A hotel that the agency paid for me.
translation.ja: ホテルが原因で ホテルに泊まってたから

translation.en: So, they put us for six weeks in a hotel.
translation.ja: ６週間は 組織が負担してくれた

translation.en: I could financially afford to pay for two weeks myself in the hotel,
translation.ja: でも自己負担では ２週間が限界だった

translation.en: and then we were in a situation where I didn't have money
translation.ja: お金も寝る場所もなくなり

translation.en: and nowhere else to go. So we slept outside for three days,
translation.ja: 子供たちと３日間野宿した

translation.en: and then I was able to get into a place called the Center of Hope.
translation.ja: その後は 家族向けシェルター(センター･オブ･ホープ)へ

translation.en: It's like a one- room facility, and you sleep on mats on the floor.
translation.ja: 個室の床に マットを敷いて寝た

translation.en: Um, there are no shower facilities.
translation.ja: シャワーはなかった

translation.en: So, I made it be like we were camping.
translation.ja: キャンプということにした

translation.en: And we had to be out of the place by 6:30, seven o'clock every morning.
translation.ja: 毎朝７時前には追い出される

translation.en: Rain or shine, we had to leave.
translation.ja: 天候に関係なくね

translation.en: So, I didn't want my kids to know. I didn't want people to know.
translation.ja: 子供や世間にばれないよう

translation.en: So I would go to Safeway and get them something to eat and bathe them in the bathroom.
translation.ja: スーパーで食べ物を買い トイレで体を洗わせた

translation.en: I would take turns with them so I could go in the bathroom and wash them up and brush their hair.
translation.ja: 順番に子供たちの体を洗い 髪をとかしてあげた

translation.en: 'Cause I didn't want people to look at my kids.
translation.ja: 子供が人から見られたり

translation.en: I didn't wanna just be walking the streets.
translation.ja: ただ路上にいるのは嫌だった

translation.en: And then we would wait around for the library to open,
translation.ja: それから図書館に行き

translation.en: 'cause the library opens at 9:00.
translation.ja: ９時の開館を待った

translation.en: And I could take my babies in there, 'cause it was warm…
translation.ja: 子供たちが暖かく過ごせるし

translation.en: …and they could play video games and watch TV,
translation.ja: ゲームをしたり テレビを見たりできる

translation.en: and so they didn't understand what the struggle was.
translation.ja: 苦労を感じさせないように

translation.en: So, that's what I did every day.
translation.ja: 毎日 これの繰り返し

translation.en: Jeez.
translation.ja: 何てこと

translation.en: That's why I don't wanna be in a position that I need anybody for anything.
translation.ja: だから人に依存したくない

translation.en: - Right. - I will not do this again.
translation.ja: 二度と繰り返さない

translation.en: Right.
translation.ja: そうね

translation.en: You guys, get your stuff. They're coming down here. They're coming.
translation.ja: みんな荷物をまとめろ 警察が来るぞ

translation.en: - Calling order, please. - Check.
translation.ja: 始めましょう 始めましょう 〝サンフランシスコの 前庭はここだ〞

translation.en: Item 8A requests approval of a resolution authorizing
translation.ja: 〝サンフランシスコの 前庭はここだ〞 項目８Ａ ホームレス支援部門より 項目８Ａ ホームレス支援部門より

translation.en: the Department of Homelessness for the proposed Embarcadero SAFE Navigation Center.
translation.ja: エンバカデロにおける シェルターの承認要請です

translation.en: We're going to set up a perimeter, all encampments.
translation.ja: 野営地に境界線を引く

translation.en: We just found too many hazardous materials,
translation.ja: 危険物が多すぎるから

translation.en: so we have a crew out here to remove that right now.
translation.ja: 今すぐ撤去を行う

translation.en: We need to be allowing homeless shelters
translation.ja: ホームレス･シェルターの

translation.en: in every single neighborhood across the city.
translation.ja: 市内への設置を許すべきです

translation.en: Get all your stuff out.
translation.ja: 全て運び出せ

translation.en: Get it out. At least get your tents and all that stuff out of here.
translation.ja: テントと持ち物は全部だ

translation.en: This 200- bed Navigation Center will act as a magnet
translation.ja: 200人を収容可能な シェルターは

translation.en: and will import a massive homeless population
translation.ja: 大勢のホームレスを呼び寄せ 近隣に被害をもたらします 〝シェルター設置反対〞 大勢のホームレスを呼び寄せ 近隣に被害をもたらします

translation.en: and will harm the surrounding neighborhood.
translation.ja: 大勢のホームレスを呼び寄せ 近隣に被害をもたらします

translation.en: I asked them, Where do you want them to go?
translation.ja: どこへ行けばいい？

translation.en: There's nowhere for anyone to go. Where are they supposed to go?
translation.ja: 行く場所はない どこへ行けと言うのか

translation.en: I have never seen a mayor jam down the throats
translation.ja: 市長が強要するなど 前代未聞です

translation.en: of a neighborhood a project
translation.ja: 近隣住民の95パーセントが 反対しています

translation.en: when the neighborhood was 95% opposed.
translation.ja: 近隣住民の95パーセントが 反対しています 〝街に安全を〞 近隣住民の95パーセントが 反対しています

translation.en: I was just called a racist
translation.ja: これが人種差別？

translation.en: for not wanting things like drug use, drug sale,
translation.ja: 薬物の問題や ホームレスの増加を

translation.en: importing additional homeless into our neighborhood.
translation.ja: 望まないだけです

translation.en: Yeah, I don't think a lot of people want those things in their backyard.
translation.ja: 望む人は少ないでしょう

translation.en: People are dying in your front yard!
translation.ja: 前庭で人が死んでいく！

translation.en: People are dying in your front yard!
translation.ja: 前庭で人が死んでいく！

translation.en: People are dying in your front yard!
translation.ja: 前庭で人が死んでいく！

translation.en: There's a better life out there, Patty. There's a better life.
translation.ja: もっといい人生が待ってる

translation.en: You just gotta believe, and you gotta work, you know?
translation.ja: そう信じて働くんだ

translation.en: And I'm a paycheck away from being in the tent right next to you, girl, so…
translation.ja: 給料が１回分なければ 俺も君の隣に住んでる

translation.en: It can happen to anybody. You know? It really can.
translation.ja: 誰にだって起こり得ることだ

translation.en: Here we go.
translation.ja: どうぞ

translation.en: Hey.
translation.ja: ほら

translation.en: Okay.
translation.ja: よしよし

translation.en: Uh, what are your plans for housing?
translation.ja: 家について計画は？

translation.en: I plan on getting a house and staying in it.
translation.ja: 手に入れる計画はある

translation.en: If I can get housing,
translation.ja: 家があれば

translation.en: I will definitely be leaving this shelter here.
translation.ja: このシェルターから出ていく

translation.en: I would be in a better environment.
translation.ja: もっといい環境へ

translation.en: I can actually eat more, shower more.
translation.ja: 食事やシャワーの 回数を増やせる

translation.en: Every time I get an apartment, I always end up homeless again.
translation.ja: 家を借りる度に ホームレスに戻る

translation.en: So, at this point, I just want to get a van, a big van, or an RV,
translation.ja: だからバンか キャンピングカーが欲しい

translation.en: and something that I own that they can't take from me, you know?
translation.ja: 所有できて 取り上げられないものだ

translation.en: Is anyone helping you apply for housing?
translation.ja: 入居するための支援者は？

translation.en: Right now, I'm waiting. I'm in a mental health program,
translation.ja: 心のケアで 世話になってるところが

translation.en: and they helped me get my Section 8 voucher, so
translation.ja: 支援制度の利用も 手伝ってくれる

translation.en: I'm just waiting for whatever they have to do.
translation.ja: 今はただ待ってる状態だ

translation.en: Are there any other goals that you want to work on?
translation.ja: 何か他に目標は？

translation.en: If, like, I can get a place
translation.ja: もし家が手に入ったら やるべきことをやる

translation.en: and do what I have to do to keep my head, like,
translation.ja: もし家が手に入ったら やるべきことをやる 路上生活のことを 考えないようにする

translation.en: out of the street mind.
translation.ja: 路上生活のことを 考えないようにする

translation.en: But that's all I-- Like, to be honest, that's all I know.
translation.ja: 分かることはそれだけ

translation.en: Okay.
translation.ja: なるほど

translation.en: I really want
translation.ja: 私の望みは―

translation.en: to be stable,
translation.ja: 安定した生活

translation.en: and…
translation.ja: それから…

translation.en: have my family around me like I used to.
translation.ja: 家族との関わりを 取り戻したい

translation.en: I've always had that desire to get off the streets.
translation.ja: 路上生活をやめたい

translation.en: It's just been hard.
translation.ja: つらいよ

translation.en: I'm not trying to bother anybody, you know, burden anybody.
translation.ja: 人を苦しめようとはしてない

translation.en: And when police used to wake us up and rustle us up,
translation.ja: 警察は俺たちを起こし せかしながら言う

translation.en: You can't be here.
translation.ja: “ここはダメだ”

translation.en: I used to tell them, I do the same things you do.
translation.ja: だがしてることは 彼らと同じだ

translation.en: I wash my teeth. I gotta eat.
translation.ja: 歯を磨き 食事をする

translation.en: The only thing for me, everything is spread out.
translation.ja: ただ物が散らばってる

translation.en: Everybody else just got it inside, in one spot.
translation.ja: 普通 物は家の中に まとまってる

translation.en: But I do the same things everybody else does.
translation.ja: だが同じように生きてる

translation.en: Nothing different.
translation.ja: 何も違わない

translation.en: We're all in this ship, and we're still sinking.
translation.ja: 我々は皆 沈む船の乗員です

translation.en: Particularly in high- cost cities like ours, I mean,
translation.ja: 生活費の高い都市では特に

translation.en: we are not reaching enough people,
translation.ja: 支援が行き届いていません

translation.en: and Oakland's homelessness has doubled in four years. Doubled.
translation.ja: オークランドの ホームレス人口は オークランドの ホームレス人口は 〝Ｄ･スタインバーグ 市長〞 オークランドの ホームレス人口は オークランドの ホームレス人口は 〝Ｅ･ガルセッティ市長〞 〝Ｅ･ガルセッティ市長〞 〝Ｅ･ガルセッティ市長〞 ４年で倍増しました ４年で倍増しました ４年で倍増しました 〝Ｌ･シャーフ市長〞

translation.en: That especially hits hard certain communities.
translation.ja: 特定の共同体に影響が強く

translation.en: If you're African- American, or if you've ever served time, there's even a greater likelihood.
translation.ja: 黒人や逮捕歴がある場合は 可能性が高くなります

translation.en: And then, of course, COVID- 19 hits.
translation.ja: 新型コロナウイルスの 影響も

translation.en: Everyone sees the tsunami of homelessness coming
translation.ja: 家を失った人々が 津波のように 押し寄せています

translation.en: because nobody can pay the rent
translation.ja: 彼らは皆 家賃を払えず

translation.en: and those eviction moratoriums are gonna run out.
translation.ja: 立ち退き猶予もわずかです

translation.en: This requires a different level of commitment, and we need a FEMA- like response to this.
translation.ja: 異次元の献身と 災害レベルの対応が必要です

translation.en: How do we make sure there is a right to housing in California?
translation.ja: カリフォルニア州に住む 権利を保証する手だては？

translation.en: We have a lot of work to do, but cities and counties can't do it alone.
translation.ja: 課題は多く 市や郡だけでは 追いつきません

translation.en: These heartbreaking stories have got to come to some dramatic,
translation.ja: こうした痛ましい事態を 劇的な変化へと つなげなければなりません

translation.en: necessary change.
translation.ja: 劇的な変化へと つなげなければなりません

translation.en: ♪ Well, every road I see ♪
translation.ja: 見えているどの道も

translation.en: ♪ Leads away from me ♪
translation.ja: 私から伸びている

translation.en: ♪ There's not a single one ♪ ♪ That leads me home ♪
translation.ja: １本として 　　帰る場所に続く道はない

translation.en: ♪ The road keeps saying ♪
translation.ja: 道の声がする

translation.en: ♪ Friend, come see what's round the bend ♪
translation.ja: 友よ 曲がった先を 見に来いと

translation.en: ♪ So is it any wonder that I roam? ♪
translation.ja: さすらうことに 　　何の不思議があるだろう

translation.en: ♪ All the places I have been ♪
translation.ja: かつて訪ねた場所が

translation.en: ♪ Keep calling me back again ♪
translation.ja: 再び私を呼び戻す

translation.en: You're a good girl.
translation.ja: いい子ね

translation.en: ♪ Down in the pines ♪ ♪ I hear the cold winds blow ♪
translation.ja: 松の木々の下 　　冷たい風が吹きすさぶ

translation.en: ♪ My heart keeps telling me ♪
translation.ja: 心は訴え続ける

translation.en: ♪ Footloose and fancy- free ♪
translation.ja: 勝手気ままにと

translation.en: ♪ And the road goes by ♪
translation.ja: 道は続く

translation.en: ♪ And calls me as it goes ♪
translation.ja: その先へ私を誘う

translation.en: ♪ Well, maybe somewhere There's a someone ♪
translation.ja: きっと どこかには

translation.en: ♪ Waiting there with a smile ♪
translation.ja: 笑顔で待つ人がいる

translation.en: ♪ And maybe there'll be a place ♪
translation.ja: きっと どこかには

translation.en: ♪ To stop and rest awhile ♪
translation.ja: 羽を休める場所がある

translation.en: ♪ And maybe you weren't meant to be ♪
translation.ja: きっと あなたは

translation.en: ♪ Just a rolling stone ♪
translation.ja: 根なし草ではなかった

translation.en: ♪ And there's a road to travel on ♪
translation.ja: 進むべき道がある

translation.en: ♪ That leads you back to home ♪
translation.ja: 帰る場所へと続く道が

translation.en: ♪ Oh, but I'll keep traveling on ♪
translation.ja: それでも私は旅をする

translation.en: ♪ Keep looking at the dawn ♪
translation.ja: 夜明けを眺め続ける

translation.en: ♪ Till I can lay this lonesome body down ♪
translation.ja: 孤独なこの体を横たえるまで

translation.en: ♪ And when that day has come ♪
translation.ja: その日が来たら

translation.en: ♪ I nevermore will roam ♪
translation.ja: もうさすらうことはない

translation.en: ♪ And every road I see will lead me home ♪
translation.ja: どの道も 　　私の帰る場所へと続く

translation.en: Ready for nite- nite, Luna?
translation.ja: 寝る準備はいいか？

translation.en: All right.
translation.ja: これでよし

translation.en: Tomorrow's another day.
translation.ja: 明日があるさ
